category: Member sport organization regulations/Article 27-2 (Appointment to honorary positions)
contents: Article 27-2 (Appointment of Honorary Position) ① Member sports organizations may appoint an honorary chairman and an honorary position such as an advisor as stipulated in the following items. 1. The honorary chairman shall be elected at the general meeting and may attend the board of directors and general meeting and give advice. there is. 2. Advisors, etc. are appointed by the Chairman with the consent of the Board of Directors. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ② Any person who falls under any of the grounds for disqualification as an executive under each subparagraph of Article 26 (1) (excluding subparagraph 11) shall not hold an honorary position under paragraph (1). Revised July 24, 2019. ③ No remuneration will be paid to those appointed to honorary positions. However, expenses necessary for performing duties may be paid at actual cost. Revised on October 6, 2021 [This Article Newly Inserted on March 23, 2017]
